text: The Orsini give that to traitors. There is no escaping the vengeance of an Orsini. Do you understand? 'Yes, signor' she faltered. 'On the other hand' he continued, giving her a keen look, 'the Orsini are generous to those who serve them faithfully. We hunt a traitor down to the ends of the earth and no escaping the vengeance of an Orsini. Yes, Signor she faltered. 'On the other hand,' he continued, giving her a keen look, 'the Orsini are generous to those who serve them faithfully.
